sourcesContent: import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { // Inputs from the form @Input() width!: number; @Input() height!: number; @Input() horizontalLines!: number; @Input() verticalLines!: number; @Input() horizontalDistances!: number[]; @Input() verticalDistances!: number[]; // Chart type public barChartType = 'bar'; // Chart data // Chart data public barChartData: {data: number[], label: string}[] = []; // Chart labels public barChartLabels: string[] = []; // Chart options public barChartOptions = { responsive: true, scales: { xAxes: [{ ticks: { beginAtZero: true } }], yAxes: [{ ticks: { beginAtZero: true } }] } }; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { // Calculate the data and labels for the chart this.calculateChartData(); this.calculateChartLabels(); } calculateChartData(): void { // Initialize an empty array for the data let data = []; // Loop through the horizontal lines for (let i = 0; i < this.horizontalLines; i++) { // Calculate the height of each line segment let segmentHeight = i === 0 ? this.horizontalDistances[i] : this.horizontalDistances[i] - this.horizontalDistances[i - 1]; // Push the segment height to the data array data.push(segmentHeight); } // Push the remaining height to the data array let remainingHeight = this.height - this.horizontalDistances[this.horizontalLines - 1]; data.push(remainingHeight); // Set the chart data to the data array this.barChartData = [ {data: data, label: 'Height'} ]; } calculateChartLabels(): void { // Initialize an empty array for the labels let labels = []; // Loop through the vertical lines for (let i = 0; i < this.verticalLines; i++) { // Calculate the width of each line segment let segmentWidth = i === 0 ? this.verticalDistances[i] : this.verticalDistances[i] - this.verticalDistances[i - 1]; // Push the segment width to the labels array labels.push(segmentWidth + ' mm'); } // Push the remaining width to the labels array let remainingWidth = this.width - this.verticalDistances[this.verticalLines - 1]; labels.push(remainingWidth + ' mm'); // Set the chart labels to the labels array this.barChartLabels = labels; } }
